DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test two different sirolimus-based immunosuppressive regimens for elderly kidney transplant recipients.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Two Different Sirolimus-based Immunosuppressive Regimens in Elderly Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: End stage renal disease Kidney transplantation Both donor and recipient older than 60 years Prior or concurrent transplant of any organ other than the kidney Current clinically significant infections
